## SHOP BY CATEGORY

### OPTIMAL FUNCTION  
THROUGH TECH

Enjoy exercising without worrying about pain or injury with Wavewear's
compression and built-in kinetic taping sportswear. Our goal is to protect,
support, and encourage people to understand their bodies and gain confidence
in their athletic performance and daily lives.

EXPLORE NOW

### How WaveWear is different

### Scientifically Proven  
Fatigue Relief Effect

Minimizes joint and muscle tremors, resulting in up to 35% fatigue reduction.

### Movement-following  
Joint Compression

When using the joint, it is firmly supported with 3x more pressure and
support.  

### Fast, Easy, Wearable  
Taping Effect

Built-in adhesive silicone tape targets large muscle groups to fit anyone who
wears.

### Semi Permanent  
Sports Taping

The silicone adhesion is restored by washing and does not tear nor rip off the
fabric.

LEARN MORE
